head.title: A Confident Gore Sets Off on a Grand Tour

hedline.hl1: A Confident Gore Sets Off on a Grand Tour

abstract.p: Photo of Vice Pres Al Gore campaigning for president in Philadelphia

block.p: Vice President Al Gore begins the fall stretch of the campaign buoyant in the polls and brimming with confidence. Perhaps the strongest sign of this self-assurance is the Gore campaign's grab for Florida, a state that has been perceived as pro-Bush for months and where Gov. George W. Bush's brother Jeb is the governor. Mr. Gore will pop into Tampa in a 24-hour Labor Day tour and plans to pay frequent calls to other swing states, including Pennsylvania, Ohio and Michigan. PAGE A14
